Privacy Policy

The Ariel Medical site is owned by Ariel Medical SRL, owner of your personal data.

We have adopted this privacy policy, which determines the treatment of the information collected by Ariel Medical, as well as the reasons for collecting certain personal data about you. Therefore, you must read this reservation policy before using the Ariel Medical site.

We process your personal data and guarantee the confidentiality and security of the same.

Collected personal information:

When you visit Ariel Medical, we automatically collect certain information on the device, including information on the web browser, IP address, time zone and cookies installed on the device. In addition, while navigating the site, we collect information on the web pages or products displayed, web sites or
research terms related to the site and how you interact with the site. We indicate such information collected automatically as “information on the device”. In addition, we can collect personal data that we provide (including without limitation first name, last name, address, payment information, etc.) during registration to satisfy the agreement.

Why do we process data?

The security of client data is our priority, therefore we only treat user data strictly necessary to manage the site. The information collected automatically is used only to identify potential cases of abuse and to establish statistics on the use of the site. These statistical informations are not aggregated in order to identify a specific user of the system.

You are allowed to visit the site without revealing information, by which I could be identified personally. If, however, you wish to use some of the functions of the site, or wish to receive a newsletter or fill in other details, you may be required to provide personal data such as email, name, surname, city of residence, organization and telephone number. You can choose not to provide personal data, however in this case you will not be able to use some of the site’s functions. For example, you cannot receive our newsletter or contact us directly from the site. Users who do not know which information is mandatory can contact us at Infoarielmedicalgr@gmail.com

Your rights:

If you are a resident of the European Union, you have the following personal data rights:

● The right to be informed.
● The right to access
● The right to change.
● The right of elimination.
● The right to limit treatment.
● The right to data portability.
● The right of objection
● The right in relation to decisions and automated profiling.

To exercise these rights, contact us through the contact information below. In addition, if you are resident in the European Union, we process your information for the purpose of stipulating contracts with Law (for example, in the case of an order through the site), or to otherwise satisfy our legitimate commercial interests indicated above. Also, note that the information can be transferred outside of Europe, including in Canada and the United States.

Links to other sites:

Our site may contain links to other sites not managed or controlled by us. Please note that we are not responsible for the privacy practices of other sites or third parties. We invite you to pay attention if you leave the site and read the declarations on the privacy of any site that could collect personal information.

Safety of information:

We protect the information provided on controlled computer servers, a secure environment protected from unauthorized access, use or disclosure. We adopt reasonable physical, technical and administrative protection systems to protect access, use, modification and non-authorized disclosure of personal
information in our possession. Despite this, no transmission of data via the Internet or wireless network can be completely guaranteed.

Legal warning:

We will disclose information collected, used or received if required or permitted by the law, as per respect to court orders or similar legal procedures, except in the case in which we believe in good faith that disclosure is necessary to protect our rights, protect your security or the safety of others, investigate fraud or respond to governmental requests.

contact information:

For any question related to individual rights or personal information, send an email to Infoarielmedicalgr@gmail.com
